Welcome.title: Hightouch Documentation
Welcome.description: Get an overview of Hightouch's features, integrations, and how to use them.

Concepts.title: Concepts
Concepts.description: At a high-level, Hightouch constructs your data pipeline by connecting a model to a destination. This is called a sync.

Acoustic.title: Acoustic
Acoustic.description: Acoustic is a marketing platform that enables you to run automated, personalized email campaigns.

Asana.title: Asana
Asana.description: Asana is a web and mobile application designed to help teams organize, track, and manage their work.

Customer.io.title: Customer.io
Customer.io.description: With Customer.io, send targeted emails, push notifications, and SMS to lower churn, create stronger relationships, and drive subscriptions.

Google Ads.title: Google Ads
Google Ads.description: Google Ads remarketing allows you to advertise to people who have previously visited your website, used your mobile app, or who are in your CRM databases, by showing them relevant ads when they visit other sites or search on Google. The user lists used in remarketing can also be used for other types of audience targeting, such as Customer Match.

Pendo.title: Pendo
Pendo.description: Pendo is a product experience platform that helps software product teams deliver software users love.

Rokt.title: Rokt
Rokt.description: Use the Events API to send event data straight from your data warehouse to Rokt for use within Rokt's advertising platform.

Segment.title: Segment
Segment.description: Segment provides a single API to track customer data across multiple devices and channels and send it to third-party tools, internal systems, and data warehouses.

Tiktok.title: Tiktok
Tiktok.description: Use the Tiktok marketing events API to send web event information to be used within Tiktok for marketing purposes.

Zendesk.title: Zendesk
Zendesk.description: Zendesk provides a leading customer service platform that includes ticketing, self-service options, and customer support features. Its cloud-based help desk solution is used by more than 200,000 organizations worldwide.

Overview.title: Overview
Overview.description: Hightouch Audiences turns your data warehouse into a CDP (Customer Data Platform). Itâ€™s a visual drag-n-drop audience builder (typically used by marketing teams) that enables self-service cohort creation and orchestration directly from your data models in the warehouse, without requiring any SQL knowledge.

Usage.title: Usage
Usage.description: To create and sync a Hightouch Audience:

Schema.title: Schema
Schema.description: The root users table, related objects, and events, are configured in the schema tab. The schemas tab is divided into objects and events.

Sync Templates.title: Sync Templates
Sync Templates.description: Sync templates allow you to centralize configuration when syncing audiences to a particular destination. Define your sync configuration in one place, then sync your audiences without duplicating your config unnecessarily.

User Permissions.title: User Permissions
User Permissions.description: Hightouch Workspaces allow you to select granular, customizable roles to limit permissions for your users.

Pricing Information.title: Pricing Information
Pricing Information.description: Transparency into our pricing model and some answers to commonly asked questions.

Security Basics.title: Security Basics
Security Basics.description: This is an overview of our security and infrastructure.

Tunnels.title: Tunnels
Tunnels.description: Connect to your data warehouse securely. Hightouch supports the ability to self-serve set up an SSH tunnel connection, either standard or reverse.
